short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows accepting a random (subscriber) challenge and allows deleting all challenges on Lichess.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to accept a random subscriber, random challenger, and delete all challenges. Added delete all challenges for (twitch.tv/imrosen)
